caller_intent: Delphina is seeking assistance to make a payment for her auto insurance policy (policy number 3498) but is struggling with the amount due, mentioning she can only pay $157.95 instead of the originally quoted $315.90.
resolution_steps: Agent Ashley confirms the policy type (auto insurance for a Mustang) and policy number.
Clarifies the payment amount discrepancy ($157.95 vs. $315.90) and confirms Delphina's ability to pay the lower amount.
Explains the deadline (December 13th) to maintain policy good standing and consequences of missing it.
Reaffirms Delphina's prior communication about deferring payment until later in the month.
knowledge_required: Handling customer payment disputes or adjustments
summary: Ashley from Alliance Insurance assists Delphina with her auto insurance payment, resolving a discrepancy in the amount due and confirming a revised payment plan. Delphina agrees to pay $157.95 by December 13th to keep her policy active. The call concludes with Delphina confirming no further action is needed.
